title: Multi-Platform Track Fusion
description: A target is being tracked simultaneously by a ground radar, a naval ship, and an aircraft. An operator must fuse these three separate tracks into a single, high-confidence track on the COP.

tasks.description: Identify the three separate sensor tracks that are all reporting on the same entity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly identifies the multiple tracks for the same target.

tasks.description: Initiate the track fusion process in the C2 system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly uses the fusion tool.

tasks.description: Verify that the system has created a single, composite track with a higher quality and accuracy than any of the individual sensor inputs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator confirms the creation of a high-quality fused track, improving overall situational awareness.
